name: Recall (itch) (YesNinja)
description:
Just released my first game made in Unity!

Recall is a fast paced memory puzzle game.  

How to Play: 

Drag your finger to draw a path from the white dot to the red dot while avoiding obstacles but  be careful, when you start the level disappears!

Score:

The faster you beat the level the more points you make. Travel longer distances quickly to also boost your score.  Complete multiple levels in a row to gain even more points and stack up a high score.

Obstacles:

White - Never moves, always visible.
Black - Only visible before drawing.  Only moves if connected to a movable object.
Red - Movable and always visible.
Green - Movable and always visible.

Leaderboards coming soon.
